caption: The video may begin with a group of people safeguarding a treasure when suddenly, a robot from afar forcefully takes the treasure away. One of the men in the group feels deeply responsible and decides to confront the robot at its lair alone. After a fierce battle, the pilot of the mech steps out, and to the manâ€™s shock and horror, he realizes the pilot shares his face. Confused and bewildered, he follows the mech pilot on a tour of the pilot's base. During this visit, he learns the truth about the situation from the mech pilot.
